header.description: AI-powered GitLab assistant that summarizes issues and MRs using AI for quick understanding.

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Customize the appearance and language of your extension

gitlab.title: GitLab Configuration
gitlab.description: Configure your GitLab instance connection settings
gitlab.autoDetectNote: The GitLab URL is automatically detected when you visit a GitLab page.

aiProvider.title: AI Provider Settings
aiProvider.description: Configure your preferred AI provider and model for code analysis
aiProvider.securityTip: API keys are stored securely in your browser and never shared.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Customize how the AI understands and responds to you
personalization.instructionsPlaceholder: e.g., Always provide code examples, Focus on security aspects...
personalization.nicknamePlaceholder: How should the AI address you?
personalization.occupationPlaceholder: e.g., Senior Frontend Developer, Product Manager...
personalization.aboutYouPlaceholder: e.g., I work with React and TypeScript, prefer functional programming...
personalization.tip: Better context = Better responses! The more details you provide, the more tailored the AI responses will be.

slack.title: Slack Integration
slack.description: Connect your Slack workspace to share AI summaries and insights directly with your team
slack.webhookUrlHelp: Create an Incoming Webhook in your Slack App settings.
slack.enterWebhookFirst: Please enter a webhook URL first
slack.botNameHelp: The name that will appear as the sender in Slack
slack.defaultChannelHelp: Optional: Override the default channel set in your webhook
slack.iconEmojiHelp: Slack emoji to use as the bot's icon (e.g., :robot_face:, :brain:, :sparkles:)
slack.step1: After any AI response, click the Share to Slack button
slack.step2: Use the chat to ask AI to "send this to Slack"
slack.step3: Summaries and code reviews can be shared instantly
slack.step4: Messages include context about the source (issue/MR)
